#summary How to install WebIDE Zen Coding
#labels Phase-Deploy

= How to install WebIDE Zen Coding =

Copy file zen_coding.xml to a folder:

*MacOS:* ~/Library/Preferences/WebIDE10/templates

*Windows:* C:\Users\youname\.WebIde10\config\templates\

Run WebIDE

To view the available abbreviations use Ctrl + J (cmd + J)
